main event: A witness reported seeing a bright light in the sky in Fort Worth, Texas on June 3rd, moving in a straight line and circling for a short time.
interesting points: The light was observed for approximately 5 minutes,The object moved slowly and produced no visible body but emitted a flashing white light,The sighting occurred during daylight with a full moon visible,The witness was unsure of what they observed, suggesting it could be a celestial body, Insufficient data was available for a conclusive evaluation.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: The witness described the light as a bright flashing object with no discernible shape.
